sentences.en: He goes to the podiatrist to have his bunions treated.
sentences.cn: 他到足病医生那里去治他的拇囊肿。

sentences.en: There are records of the King of France employing a podiatrist, as did Napoleon.
sentences.cn: 有记载称,法国皇帝们曾经雇用足科医师, 例如拿破仑.

words.tran_cn: 足部医疗；[外科] 脚病学

trans.tran_en: a doctor who takes care of people’s feet and treats foot diseases
